Noor Khan Why not?
Motors for example are a form of centripetal force
@pspmaster2071  how ? Can u please explain a little more
Noor Khan Current flows to the motor like an electric fan for example, it spins and there is your centripetal force

If you do not like the fan example you might like this. The force in a magnetic field is a form of centripetal acceleration since it circles a wire for example. You can even use the right hand rule to represent the velocity vector.
@pspmaster2071  Thank you.🙂
Noor Khan Glad I could help!
